content.title: Explicit Priority Ordering
content.description: When multiple brains provide conflicting recommendations, use explicit priority ordering to resolve. Higher priority sources override lower priority. The ordering must be deterministic and documented.

content.title: Confidence-Based Selection
content.description: Select the option with the highest confidence score when multiple options exist. If confidence scores are equal, use a deterministic tiebreaker (e.g., alphabetical order, defined priority).

content.title: Governance Override Pattern
content.description: Governance rules always take precedence over other considerations. If a governance rule conflicts with another rule or heuristic, the governance rule wins. This ensures system integrity.
